title: The Port of Sfax
description: Sfax is a major port and home to Tunisia’s largest fishing fleet; for scale, the fishing port is 1.1 kilometers (0.7 miles) long. Across the bottom of the full scene, the bed of an ephemeral river stretches to the sea.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
